data.name: NTBSS: Master Character Training Pack - Orochimaru
data.detailed_description:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

Earn Training Points with Orochimaru to get your hands on various Ninjutsu, weapons, and costumes, allowing you to create a ninja unique to you!

Content includes:
• Three Ninjutsu:
Multiple Striking Shadow Snake (Ranged Type)
Wind Style: Great Breach (Ranged Type)
Snake Clone
• A Secret Technique:
Summoning Jutsu: Reanimation (Ranged Type)
• A Weapon:
Orochimaru's Kusanagi Sword (Defense Type)
• An Avatar Part:
Orochimaru's Hair (male only)
• Costumes:
Orochimaru Outfit: Top/Bottom (male only)
Orochimaru's Ninja Way T-Shirt

data.short_description: A special pack for avatar ninja! Special Ninjutsu Training: Round 3 features Orochimaru! Purchase the DLC to be able to train under him via the Ninjutsu Library!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
